bibl.title: Two Papyri from the "Zenon Group" in the Michigan Collection.
bibl.note: Two papyri acquired in 1925 together with a large number of papyri that belong to the Zenon archive. But it is not certain that the first document belongs to the archive; and this is rather unlikely in the case of the second papyrus. - 1. Inv. 3211. Name-list with contribution amounts. Provenance unknown, III/II BC. - 2. Inv. 3207. Letter from Agathocles to Demetrios. Philadelphia?, first half of II BC.
GAGOS T. and P.J. SIJPESTEIJN, Two Papyri from the "Zenon Group" in the Michigan Collection.
